body_html:
It's actually a user error. The problem is the following:

  • You are using tf.keras, in particular the tf.keras BN layer (part of Xception model)
  • You are setting the learning phase via K which is imported from keras (not tf.keras)

Therefore setting the learning phase does nothing to your model: it's acting on a different python module altogether...

The solution is this:

from tensorflow import keras
K = keras.backend

body:
It's actually a user error. The problem is the following:

- You are using `tf.keras`, in particular the tf.keras BN layer (part of Xception model)
- You are setting the learning phase via `K` which is imported from `keras` (not tf.keras)

Therefore setting the learning phase does nothing to your model: it's acting on a different python module altogether...

The solution is this:

```python
from tensorflow import keras
K = keras.backend
```
